thread.title: Wayne

author: Wayne
title: Wayne
text: I had Wayne and Ben from tyres on the drive come to my place of work to replace two tyres on my caddy van. They contacted me when they was ten minutes away and arrived promptly. After confirming what was to be done and mileage taken, they they continued with the job in hand. Both were exstreamly professional and friendly. i received a inspection report via email which was nice. No pushing for other work to be done just a fantastic service and after comparing with other static yre companies i will be using for all future replacements. Thanks Wayne & Ben and of course tyres on the drive .com for a job well done!
